[[Jirōbō]] slams his hands to the ground. The strength of this slam is great enough to rip open a section of the [[earth]] in front of him and leverage it up into a wall, similar to a {{translation|"[[wikipedia:tatami|tatami]] return"|畳返し}}. This wall of earth shields Jirōbō, usually from projectile attacks, but it can also be used against approaching physical strikes.<ref name="d2"/>

After acquiring Jirōbō's DNA, [[Kabuto Yakushi]] is able use this technique through his [[Strange Transmission Distant Shadow]] technique. In Kabuto's use, the ground is lifted up on both sides of him, thus shifting the approaching [[Amaterasu]] away from him.<ref name="ch585">''Naruto'' chapter 585, page 4</ref>

== Trivia == 
* When Kabuto uses this technique, he refers to it as {{translation|"Jirōbō: Earth Release: Earth Shore Return"|次郎坊・土遁・土陸返し|Jirōbō: Doton: Doroku Gaeshi}}.<ref name="ch585"/>
